website_summaries.verdict: Its ability to fully charge a controller in 2 hours, ergonomic design that allows it to be used as it recharges, and array of colors make this model a winner.
pros: Magnetic contacts ensure a secure connection every time
Available in a wide range of colors to match your controller
Users can navigate as it charges
cons: Some charging stand colors are rarer to find than others

customer_reviews.title: Really Well made and does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Has a really nice look with the Gears 5 Controller. The base is well weighted so the controller won't tip out. It has a rubberized bottom so it won't slide around. Comes with a code for a supply drop in Gears 5. The battery life lasts longer then the charge & play kit Microsoft makes. Would buy this product again for my other controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rohrbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Becomes a paperweight when battery eventually stops holding charge
customer_reviews.text: Well, this works as long as the battery holds charge. Like all batteries, it eventually starts to fail...but the problem with this whole setup is that these guys don’t sell their special battery pack with the exposed metal connectors separately. I contacted their support, wrote to their twitter and was ignored on all fronts. So now I have a $50 controller stand. Stick with the official play and charge kit from MS. Or any other company that stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues.
customer_reviews.text: The Battery would not charge when placed on the stand. The LED indicator light on the stand would not light up orange for charging or white for fully charged when I put the controller on the stand. I tried a battery from a previously purchased stand and the new base would charge it so the issue was with the battery that came with this stand. Since they do not sell replacement batteries for this stand I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: chilman59

customer_reviews.title: No replacement batteries
customer_reviews.text: This company does not allow you to buy replacement batteries. So as soon as it dies after a year of playing, you need to buy the entire kit over again. Incredibly wasteful!
customer_reviews.author: PVDbiker

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Gears Art Piece
customer_reviews.text: I like that the color scheme and feel are just like the Kait controller. I’m a huge gears fan so this is a must. Nice to have a stand for making the controller look good and it is always charged!
customer_reviews.author: Chatty

customer_reviews.title: #bemorepirate
customer_reviews.text: If you have the limited edition Sea of Thieves controller this is the obvious companion. Not only does it recharge but it beautifully displayes your controller in all of it’s glow in the dark awesomeness. The cool unicorn narwhal battery cover is even reproduced, but I’d recommend keeping the old one in your original box incase you want to switch back. Set up is super easy just pop off the battery cover, remove batteries, pop in rechargible battery pack, instal new cover and charge until completion. Even if you don’t have the Sea of Thieves controller any one will still look great displaying your pirate pride. #bemorepirate
customer_reviews.author: Cujo

customer_reviews.title: Better charging stands out there
customer_reviews.text: The one I received came with a defective battery that would not charge, so I sent it back. Seems like it would be nice for having a place to charge and set your controller, but I didn't see any LED's to indicate whether or not the battery is charging or fully charged when seated. That's a pretty basic and important feature that you find on most charging stands.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Fashion forward
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful device. Most "gamer" electronics are gaudy and way over the top (I don't need rainbow, RGB, flashlights blasting out of every crease, surface and hole at all times). I'm thoroughly impressed that there's a matching charging stand specific to one special edition Xbox One game controller. Wow. My understanding is that Microsoft made a deal with this company to create matching charging stands with their controllers. I wish all consumer electronic companies treated all their products like their own art form. Microsoft doesn't always get it right, but they know how to make a controller. Usability of this controller for PC gaming - that's for a different review.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Does not work correctly
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given it a five star but unfortunately in order for it to work I had to take off the back of the controller off for it to even touch the prongs from the charger. Does it work yes does it work perfectly absolutely not it has problems catching the prongs like I said for the charge to take place. Other than that looks great comes with everything it says and comes with the working free Xbox live and free game pass for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: The1Vibez

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: The holes on the back cover do not line up with the charger so they do not connect and charge when the cover is on, which defeats the purpose of this item. The color is nice so it would have been nice if the product actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Battery will not charge while sitting on the stand. The battery backing cover and/or the battery do not match up and will not reach the battery contact points to charge. So much for promising official xbox licensed equipment. Very disappointed in my purchase and will advise all my friends not to purchase this for their systems. The color does match the controller. Anyone looking to show off controllers just purchase the stands without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Sipple

customer_reviews.title: This item is pretty, but....
customer_reviews.text: As cool as this charging base and controller is. The battery for it doesnt last long and after bout 2 months the controller sometimes doesnt even stay charged at all. So i dont know if my battery pack that came with it is dying or the controller itself is going. Gonna buy a new battery pack and see how things go. Again the controller and base is the coolest looking one i've seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect color match and a great looking stand...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works forever, my batteries never die. It rests easily on the stand and charges even if it's off by a mm or so. Most importantly, the replacement back is actually a true match to the very subtle off-black that this controller is backed with. The orange on orange looks amazing, I have this combo and I am ecstatic with both the controller and the charging station! I have been using daily for over a month now, no problems whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast
customer_reviews.text: I love how it matches my sport white controller perfectly. I would highly recommend it for anyone looking for a cool charging dock like wants something different.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Takacs

customer_reviews.title: Misleading title. Thinking you are getting controller. Just getting charging station.
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking I was getting a controller and stand for money as controllers can be expensive. Listing VERY misleading ig you don't read properly especially when looking for controller itself. Avoid buying unless you have matching controller.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sommer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the matching controller for my son for Christmas and we plugged it in, some lights flashed white and red but it does not charge the controller and there are no lights on when the controller is on the station. Waste of money. They charge WAY too much money for this not to work! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: imma gears freek
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great charger. Well weighted. Get the Gears 5 controller too! Best thing is I don't have to jiggle the matching controller around to make contact cause it fits into the charger so snug. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky The Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sleek, handles like a dream. Buttons don’t stick, very intuitive. Feels like heaven in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Strom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect marketing!
customer_reviews.text: The package was misleading. I thought it was the whole controller and the stand. The price is exactly the same as a new controller. It's got a controller on the package. Makes you think that you need a $250 controller because it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: NonyaBiznizz

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Stand and Charger
customer_reviews.text: Very cool stand and charger for the Cyberpunk controller. But, this would be nice for any controller if you didn't get the Cyberpunk controller. The battery charges fast that comes with the package and it comes with a back plate for the controller.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great stand and perfect color match!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works forever, my batteries never die. It rests easily on the stand and charges even if it's off by a a little. Most importantly, the replacement back is actually a true match to the very subtle off-red that this controller is backed with. The red on maroon looks amazing, I have this combo and I am ecstatic with both the controller and the charging station! I have been using daily for over a month now, no problems whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks sweet
customer_reviews.text: Getting ready for hopefully the actual release of Cyberpunk 2077 in November. Got my basement gaming area all setup with various Cyberpunk items, and this charging stand paired with the Cyberpunk controller is the perfect touch.
customer_reviews.author: drdoug99

customer_reviews.title: Color not as appears on box.
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered after seeing these in a local Microsoft store. The color of the base is completely off from the image on the box. I ordered a Military Green to match up to my Halo Green controller. What I received was a charcoal colored base. It would not have been a big deal if I wasn't trying to match the controller. The base itself is an awesome wireless charging stand but the color scheme is completely wrong. I hope the picture can help show you the variation in colors between the stand, controller, and box visual.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: A must for your SoT controller!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! The controller sits very snug on the dock, no clips or anything, just the weight of controller keeps it in place. My only critique is that the battery pack fits exactly into the compartment, a little too exact. You'll need to push it in slightly so it sits inside and to pop it out, you'll need a little force for that too. Otherwise, it looks beautiful with the SoT controller, even the battery compartment cover that comes with set has the same dual unicorn design as the SoT controller.
customer_reviews.author: Gian O.

customer_reviews.title: Battery door impedes charging
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Though the charging base looks nice and claims to be a 'perfect fit,' the back battery cover disrupts charging. With it in place my matching controller WILL NOT CHARGE. The battery cover MUST be removed for the battery to charge at all. Furthermore, once the door is removed, the controller still doesn't naturally sit in the proper position for charging and must be finagled until the light comes on. For the price, I would highly not recommend until the battery door issues is resolved. At the moment I am considering sanding down the bump out and widening the exposure hole to allow better connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product. So i can really give it a fair review. The picture made me think I was getting the controller and not just the charging station.
customer_reviews.author: Kayci

customer_reviews.title: Fix the Light, Cover Same Color
customer_reviews.text: Like many of you already know, this is a good product but the issues about the light in front NOT working makes this product, so so in my eyes, I can't tell if it's charging or not... i move it around and the orange light appears briefly... also I wise they'd make the back cover the same color... it just looks weird... I've only had it a couple of weeks...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my gaming rig
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to help keep my desk looking crisp and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It works perfectly with your Xbox One controller and it does come with a battery. The Charger connector is a AC Adapter for the base, not a micro-usb as the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Joel G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Ass
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an awesome controller. I’ve had this controller for a year and let me tell you it is durable functional comfortable and all-around awesome controller I would buy this controller only 10,000 times over
customer_reviews.author: Luke M.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CONTROLLER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Xbox one controller, got it mainly for some games that work better with a controller on my pc. Love the cyberpunk design very detailed and well done. The no future etched onto the controller really surprised. Would recommend this controller to anyone well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Enmanuel Manny Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Controller Gear Officially Licensed Oxide Red Xbox Pro Charging Stand
customer_reviews.text: The Controller Gear Officially Licensed Oxide Red Xbox Pro Charging Stand works great. When I'm done playing, I just sit the controller on the charger and its ready for the next time I use it. I just hope the battery lasts.
customer_reviews.author: R. CORNOG

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Artic Camo controller
customer_reviews.text: It matches perfectly my Artic Camo, great if you own only one controller or just want to showcase one. It comes with a rechargeable battery, a wall plug, a battery cover with a cutout for the pins to make contact with the batteries and the base which is the charger and stand. Bare in mind the battery is a very tight fit, at first I thought it didn't fit but you have to push it down. I'll try to update me review after I use this stand for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Biavela

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the Cyber Punk controller
customer_reviews.text: This charger is expensive for sure but it’s the perfect compliment to the Cyber Punk controller. I highly recommend this charger if you’re willing to pay the extra.
customer_reviews.author: a6russe

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A fast and simple way to charge your Xbox wireless controller. This charger keeps the battery charged better than the usb cord that came with my original charging battery. The price was great and it works great for one controller.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Goheen

customer_reviews.title: Gears of war Charging stand
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I would recommend buying this any day fast and easy delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffine

customer_reviews.title: A Gamble
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different color from Microsoft and it charges with no problem. But this one you have to maneuver it around and readjust it to the base to have a steady charge. I wish my son would had told me sooner so I could have return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like that when you order the stand/charger it come with a back that matches the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Caballeo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Flawlessly matches the controller and the console. Perfect way to display the controller. Highly recommend this if the price doesn’t scare you away.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Does not charge your controller by simply setting it on the charging dock. You have to look for and find the sweet spot for a bit before the charging light comes on to let you know its charging. Using the battery cover that come with it, will not charge your controller at all. Save your money or just buy another xbox controller with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but still cheap
customer_reviews.text: This controller is just a bit sturdier then the generic controllers, but still cheaply made. Xbox is slacking.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Elegant Solution!
customer_reviews.text: These look really nice and are perfect for keeping the XBox controller charged! Comes with the rechargeable battery and battery compartment cover. Probably the best solution I've seen, just sit it on the cradle. Almost looks like a work of art.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bird

customer_reviews.title: Customer services is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I asked them some simple questions but never got a reply. Product is so far so good though. Don't expect any support in case the product fails.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: gear abyss black
customer_reviews.text: this charger works great but other one i got gear of war red does not upset about that due its goes with the controller but does not light up to see if controller is charging
customer_reviews.author: pipies

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works good, had to modify the contacts! Wouldn’t charge the controller until I did!
customer_reviews.author: BigSteve

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in a matter of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Got this on November 9th, as of today it no longer works. Worked earlier in the day now when you plug it in the lights flash and then nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass piece of hardware to charge my matching remote
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I got one these at the retail price rather then all the other overly exaggerated prices, this is an excellent fit with my new cyberpunk 2077 Xbox one x collection, chargers my remote quickly and with style
customer_reviews.author: Fredy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great details
customer_reviews.text: The details on this are amazing, matches the controller perfectly. Very good battery life, and the controller nestles in to charge very easily. Not finicky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Son so far has enjoyed the charger, be advise controller don't come with it like he thought..
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Priz

customer_reviews.title: Refund or replacement
customer_reviews.text: Never charged the controller. The pins don't make contact when the back plate is on. When it's off the pins don't make contact either so it doesn't charge, and they ended up getting bent trying to maneuver the controller to make it charge. Worst $60 ever spent. Refund or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Get charged
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item if you are tired of changing batteries. It comes with the base charger, batteries and battery encloser. Now what to do with the original battery encloser.
customer_reviews.author: Stefhan

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one i bought. The first one is great and is still running strong. I highly recommend this for an xbox gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier J.

customer_reviews.title: Package damaged
customer_reviews.text: Package came in damaged Not sure if charger is okay or not This was a gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.author: vincent taylor AND DIANNE TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: What are the best
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my master chief halo controller in them Stan blends right in with the color. Battery and charging system works great and it’s one of the better changeing systems they have bought for Xbox controller
customer_reviews.author: NightDrake

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic 10 year old says 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The 10 year old boy who received this for Christmas was ecstatic! Loved the way it looked and works well! He said it totally deserves 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Aki

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Perfect to go with my Xbox One X ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Perfect to go with my Xbox One X Project Scorpio console. Only thing is the back cover for the battery pack is cheap and not the same quality as the regular cover.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It was great...
customer_reviews.text: Same problem that others are having, works for a couple of weeks then doesn't charge the battery. Colors flash white and orange quickly then goes black, nothing happens. Wish I could switch it for one that works instead of having to pay another $40-$50 on another. Insurance may be a need with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Warren G. Pannill III

customer_reviews.title: Bad Seller
customer_reviews.text: So you thought this was ok? This bix looks like a 500 lb Gorilla used it for kick ball practice for a year. Totally unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Love the stand, came with pins bent.
customer_reviews.text: It works just as described, love the stand. Mine came with some pins bent even though the shipping or packing was not damaged so I have to assume it was damaged from the factory, I was able to take some needle nose pliers and straighten them out so that it would work. Its a great little stand and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Superb.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product. Excellent quailty and matches my Cyberpunk 2077 controller perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Boxley

customer_reviews.title: Good value fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present for my son he loves it
customer_reviews.author: vfleming

customer_reviews.title: Arrived not working
customer_reviews.text: Arrived non working, the connector pins were bent all out of shape and not touching contact points on controller battery. Took it apart and bent them back into shape, only time will tell how long it remains functioning. Box was perfect condition, must have been a factory production issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Means

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Controller charger base looks just as awesome as the controller. A must have! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality, beautiful looks, and the lithium rechargable battery last long.
customer_reviews.author: Gaston

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: MISLEADING picture!!! I know it's my fault for not reading the fine print, but I searched for a controller and got excited when I saw this picture. Not cool. They write "stand" All the way at the end of the post.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie krueger

customer_reviews.title: Take the cover off to charge!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you take the cover off the controller to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Works well mismatched color back piece.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great. Little silly that the piece that covers the battery isn’t “Oxide red” like the rest of it. If I took the time to pick the right color, obviously this matters. Just sent the company an email. Let’s see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Very specific design
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t allow for chat pad to be attached while charging but does look nice on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: JASON

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts longer than expected, charging stand (separate purchase) is easy to install controller on.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect complement to your Cyberpunk controller.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Works great. And matches my Cyberpunk Xbox setup perfectly. I wish I had bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues
customer_reviews.text: The included battery, does not work or fit properly in the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Orion Nights

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, good quality material. It has some weight for stability, which is great. Basic and flawless functionality: lights orange when docking, white when the charging's done. The battery needs a little "convincing" when you put it into the controller, guess it's to make sure it stays there :)
customer_reviews.author: Paul Horga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly with xbox one controller, matches the red controller I bought perfectly. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Patchek

customer_reviews.title: Really great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Way better than any of the ones you get from your local stores. It’s weighted so it doesn’t slide around and the battery lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua and Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't going to spend the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I'm rather frugal, as often as possible...but I had my Gears 360 stolen, and finally replaced it years later with the Kait Diaz Gears 5 edition. If you're into the universe even a little, and you have the controller, you should get it. They fit together really well.
customer_reviews.author: Dertah

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive my purchase today only to find out, that it’s only good for a display stand. Does not work,charge, light up...nothing. All plugged in as you can see and nothing. So bummed. Looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Moats

customer_reviews.title: Best control for my daughter’s xbox
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughter’s Christmas gift. She couldn’t be happier. She says it has a nice grip and that is very important for her. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gears lover
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest controller I’ve seen yet..
customer_reviews.author: YURI

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Tried many different brands and always got issues, this is a Microsoft approved product and is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arturo Jimenez Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and a great charger stand.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition for the Cyberpunk controller(or any controller) especially if your ready for the game to launch.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Day One
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today, plugged it in to charge. It's beautiful and goes great with my fortnite purple edition xbox. Shipped fast, no damages.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charging stand - Buy them together
customer_reviews.text: I love this charging stand. I bought for my boyfriend a long with the matching controller and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Junk charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger is such junk. Charged our controller a total of ONE time. I take the cord out of the back of the chargers, put it back in, the light flashes through a series of colors and then nothing...Junk. if I could have, I would have chose zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit properly in the controller. At all.
customer_reviews.text: I got it on time, if not a little early, but it doesn't fit the controller it was intended for. Why? I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: StazTheMemer

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Son is a big fan of game and loves the stand
customer_reviews.author: JTiff

customer_reviews.title: Misled to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is not a controller only a charger base feel like I was misled
customer_reviews.author: Taino

customer_reviews.title: Form & Function
customer_reviews.text: This charger/cradle is awesome. Looks great on my cpu desk
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Junk ! avoid !
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Doesn’t charge without taking the back off. What kind of dumb crap is that?? Mine wouldn’t charge with the cover off. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Matches perfectly with the gears Xbox one X console.
customer_reviews.author: Homey G

customer_reviews.title: Sweet charger/controller holder
customer_reviews.text: Goes with my project scorpio xbox one x love the charger its freaking awesome
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome controller
customer_reviews.text: Controller is awesome and base to charge is so cool
customer_reviews.author: ronnie straw

customer_reviews.title: Completes the experience
customer_reviews.text: Charges fast. Lasts longer then other batteries we’ve tried. Comes with the base and battery. Controller not included.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Devin T.

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband and he LOVES it!!! He loves this game so this was a nice addition for him. He says it’s very responsive and he likes that!
customer_reviews.author: psmith124

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable controller
customer_reviews.text: Great and comfortable controller with grips and both back sides of controller. Very cool design very futuristic in design.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Matches my XBOX ONE Red contoller perfectly. All parts functioning perfectly, charges the included battery pack perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself pretty quicky.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who was going through batteries like crazy. He has been happy with the charger and battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful controller . I love the style of it!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Osbourn

customer_reviews.title: It came super fast
customer_reviews.text: Came fast looks good it's a present for my man So wellsee what he said

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a controller not a stand I want a refund for this crap why would I want this
customer_reviews.author: Hudson khan

product_meta.title: Controller Gear Oxide Red Xbox Pro Charging Stand (Controller Sold Separately) - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Color:Oxide RedOne stand-up charger: keep your Xbox wireless Controller charged and ready for action with the Officially Licensed Xbox Pro charging Stand. A magnetic contact system provides a secure charge every time. And it's made with the same material as your Controller, for a perfect match and unprecedented fit. Xbox wireless Controller sold separately. In the box charging Stand rechargeable battery battery cover 6-foot charging cord.
feature_bullets: Manufactured with the same exact high quality and Color Material as your Xbox One Controller
Masterful design that includes a magnetic contact system to ensure a Perfect and secure charge every time
Ergonomically engineered to allow One hand navigation through your Xbox One dashboard while the Controller is on the charging Stand
Officially Licensed charging Stand for Xbox One
Works with Xbox One, Xbox One S, and Xbox Elite Controllers
